title: TECK
subtitle: Technical Education and Career Knowledge
description: A virtual community and mentorship program providing free access to technical education, resources,Â a safe community, and employment placement opportunities for formerly incarcerated and those impacted by the criminal legal system.

tracks.title: Digital Literacy
tracks.description: 12-week instructor-based classes followed up with individual sessions with an industry professional mentor equipping mentees with skills in computer system navigation, Google Suite, project management and much more!

tracks.title: Digital Design
tracks.description: 12-week instructor-based classes followed up with individual sessions with an industry professional mentor equipping mentees with skills in user experience, visual design, branding, userflows and much more!

title: T.RAP
subtitle: Technology, Rhythm and Passion
description: An in-person program for youth impacted by the criminal legal system providing artistry development, digital literacy, and professional growth as well as individual support to achieve outlined professional and personal goals.
